projectItems.title: Meras: Immersive VR CPR Training
projectItems.description: Meras is a revolutionary virtual reality (VR) platform designed to transform CPR training. Experience realistic scenarios with immediate feedback from a virtual manikin, track your progress through detailed dashboards, and gain the confidence to save lives.
features: Simulations: Immerse yourself in true-to-life CPR scenarios.
Real-time Feedback: Receive instant feedback on your technique from the virtual manikin.
Comprehensive Dashboards: your progress and identify areas for improvement.
Confidence Building: the skills and confidence to perform CPR in real-life emergencies.
